sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import "../styles/tour-detail.css" import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup, FormText } from "reactstrap" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import tourData from "../assets/data/tours" import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' const TourDetails = () => { const {id}=useParams() const tour =tourData.find(tour=>tour.id===id) const {photo, title, desc, price, reviews, city, address, distance, maxGroupSize}=tour; const {totalRating,avgRating}=calculateAvgRating(reviews) return <>

{title}

{avgRating===0?null :avgRating} {totalRating===0?( 'Not Rated' ) :( ({reviews?.length}) )} {address}
{city} {price} /Per Person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

Reviews ( {reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
} export default TourDetails
